Description: Ostracon, fragment of the base of a red pottery shallow vessel, the fabric is coarse and partially grey in section, the interior bears traces of a dark-red slip, the exterior, which section of foot-ring surviving, is covered with a red slip and faint traces of three lines of three lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394997) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394997)
